title: World Series: Astros Framber Valdez Gets Over Failures in Game 2 Win
description: Houston’s Framber Valdez flamed out in last year’s World Series but he learned from those mistakes and dominated the Phillies in a crucial Game 2 win.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:description: Houston’s Framber Valdez was all smiles when Manager Dusty Baker came to the mound to remove him in the seventh inning on Saturday. Valdez had finally found World Series success.
